quest.name: ArmorForDagobert
quest.title: Armor For Dagobert
quest.description: Dagobert, the consultant at the bank of Semos, asks you to find a leather_cuirass for him.
quest.gm-description: * QUEST: Armor for Dagobert * * PARTICIPANTS: * - Dagobert, the consultant at the bank of Semos * * STEPS: * - Dagobert asks you to find a leather_cuirass. * - You get a leather_cuirass, e.g. by killing a cyclops. * - Dagobert sees your leather_cuirass and asks for it and then thanks you. * * REWARD: * - 50 XP * - 80 gold * * REPETITIONS: * - None.

hints.hint: A leather_cuirass is the traditional cyclops armor. Some cyclopes are living in the dungeon deep under the city.
